title: Add an admin “Next step” CTA in the Deployment Readiness banner to navigate to Activity 3 requirements

requirements.text: Update the admin-only DeploymentReadinessBanner to include a clear “next step” call-to-action that navigates to the existing Activity 3 requirements capture route "/activity-3".
acceptanceCriteria: When an admin user is logged in and the DeploymentReadinessBanner is visible, the banner includes a button/link labeled in English (e.g., "Go to Activity 3 Requirements").
Clicking the button navigates to the existing route "/activity-3" (Activity3RequirementsPage renders).
The CTA does not replace existing readiness actions (e.g., "Go to Admin Dashboard" when Stripe is not configured) and does not break the banner layout on small screens.
Non-admin users continue to never see the DeploymentReadinessBanner or the new CTA.

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (compose existing shadcn components instead).

Do not modify immutable paths: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui.
nonGoals: Do not add new backend methods or change backend authorization logic.
Do not change the existing Activity 3 requirements form fields or its copy/download behavior.
Do not change the deployment checklist logic beyond adding the new navigation CTA in the banner.
